mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Beistle , John H.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Popular, Crawford Co., Ohio [Popular, Crawford County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Beistle , John H. Patient Age: 21. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot wound right shoulder. Location Wounded: New Market, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/05/16. Nature of Wound: Minie Ball . Treatment: Furlough for 30 days June 16, 1864. Result: Recovery and returned to duty January 10th 1865.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Beistle , John H.
Gun shot wound right shoulder
